text: Tamara Ilyinichna Sinyavskaya (; born 6 July 1943, in Moscow) is a Russian mezzo-soprano from the Bolshoi Theatre.Певица Синявская стала Народной артисткой Азербайджана She was awarded the title of People's Artist of the USSR in 1982. In 1997, planet 4981 Sinyavskaya was named in her honor.Биография Синявской She was married to Soviet Azerbaijani singer Muslim Magomayev. ==References== ==External links== *Sinyavskaya on the Bolshoi Theatre website *Sinyavskaya Webpage *Russian singer Tamara Sinyavskaya on YouTube (Softpanorama) *Links to her CDs Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Moscow Category:Operatic mezzo-sopranos Category:Russian mezzo-sopranos Category:Russian opera singers Category:People's Artists of the USSR Category:People's Artists of Azerbaijan Category:Soviet female singers Category:Singers from Moscow Category:20th- century opera singers Category:20th-century women opera singers Category:Russian music educators Category:Women music educators
title: Tamara Sinyavskaya
